SqlOperation.Name: GetAllExtended
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT r.*, w.Name as WorkspaceName FROM `reg_registries` r LEFT JOIN `wspc_workspaces` w ON r.WorkspaceId = w.Id ORDER BY r.`Name` ASC;

SqlOperation.Name: GetByGlobalName
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT * FROM `reg_registries` WHERE `WorkspaceId` IS NULL AND `Name` = @Name;

SqlOperation.Name: Create
UpdateById
SqlOperation.TextCommand:
UPDATE `reg_registries` SET `Name` = @Name, `DisplayName` = @DisplayName, `Status` = @Status, `Registry` = @Registry, `Namespace` = @Namespace WHERE `Id` = @Id;
SELECT * FROM `reg_registries` WHERE `Id` = @Id;

SqlOperation.Name: DeleteById
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT * FROM `reg_registries` WHERE `Id` = @Id; DELETE FROM `reg_registries` WHERE `Id` = @Id;
